document_data.name: Sarde Telchaedrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarde Telchaedrin''' was a nobleman of [[Halruaa]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Sarde Telchaedrin hired the [[Brightstar Sash]] to go after a renegade heir of another house of Halruaa, whom he claimed was creating a bloodtaint spell that would work untold destruction.
document_data.Rumors: His uncle, Meleghost, summoned one of the members of the Sash, [[Caladnei]], to come to his house for a talk. She arrived not long after; during their talk he explained that his nephew was tricking them into striking at a rival house and setting them up to take the fall.
